name: Magic Bullet
description:
Shoot your enemies down but be careful! Bullets change colour when they bounce; if enemies are hit with a red bullet they die but if they're hit with a green bullet, they multiply. The more enemies there are on the screen, the more points you earn when killing one.

I'm trying to decide between two different movement modes so both are included.

Instructions in-game.

KNOWN BUGS:

- You (and enemies) can fly right through the walls in game mode A, so watch out for that

- For some reason, you can only select objects by clicking to the left of them. This doesn't happen when i run it on the PC I used for development and I'm still trying to figure it out
